item.title: Ten base-r functions you might not know about
item.dc:creator: Eyayaw Beze
item.description:
In this short post, we will go through 10 base r functions that you may have been underutilizing.

  1. base::lengths, base::rle
  2. stats::ave
  3. tools::file_path_sans_ext + tools::file_ext + base::baseenv
  4. stats::reshape, utils::stack
  5. base::sprintf
  6. base::sweep
  7. base::Map
  8. base::replace
  9. base::within
  10. base::strrep

item.title: Welcome to my Blog
item.dc:creator: Eyayaw Beze
item.description:
This is the first post in my blog. Welcome!

I will blog about what I have learned in my Rand Python journey. Stay tuned!
